snippet.title: Outbreak Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now at https://johanpeitz.itch.io/outbreak

They say it started in a lab, but no one knows for sure. It doesn't matter anyway, you just need to survive another 10 minutes!

- Take on never ending hordes of zombies and other monsters 
- Level up weapons and passive abilities to suit your playstyle
- Upgrade gear between runs to increase your odds of survival
- Get to the choppa!

Design/Art/Code: Johan Peitz (https://www.patreon.com/johanpeitz)  
Music/Sound: Vav (https://twitter.com/VAVMUSICMAGIC)

Many thanks to my supporters on Patreon for making it possible to keep making games like this. Subscribers get each game cheaper as soon as it is out (plus source code, early access, and all that jazz)!
